name: Pluggy
headline: Plaid for Brazil: we allow developers to access users' financial data
description:
Pluggy is a B2B Fintech that allows any developer to connect to the data from their users' bank and broker accounts, essentially Plaid for Brazil. 

We are 100% focused in Brazil. One of the largest markets in the world. Its complexity, risks and challenges require its own solution.

Local focus and our deep experience in banking tech engineering allowed Pluggy to create a product that is considered by our customers as the only one to provide reliable data at the right time to market.

We currently cover 90% of the bank accounts in Brazil a market of more than 7 billion USD. 

We are Pluggy!

founders.name: Rogerio Correa, Founder
founders.description: Responsible for operations at Pluggy, making my best to use the knowledge that I've acquired working 10 years in Business Consulting and more 3 years in Digital Transformation Consulting to build and deliver the best product for the Brazilian Market

founders.name: Victor Braga, Founder
founders.description:
Used to work in banking and M&A consultancy, but left the corporate world to create new ways of making the world a better place!

I am working with my great co-founders at Pluggy to make Open Banking in Brazil as disruptive as Brazilians need.

founders.name: Federico Miras, Founder
founders.description: Federico Mirás (or "Fefo") is an Argentinian tech entrepreneur, investor and programmer. He is the Co-Founder, Head of Product, and CEO of Pluggy. Fefo wrote his first lines of code at the age of 12 and created his first software company at the age of 19. Strong leadership and company culture skills, he loves crypto & video games.

founders.name: Gabriel Pan Gantes, Founder
founders.description: Argentinian Tech-Founder and Developer, leading the product and development of Pluggy´s solution, building developer-driven innovation with the latest technologies. Analytical, organized & practical, focus on shipping solutions as faster as possible.

# Activate the potential of Open Finance with **Pluggy**
Offer your customers a personalized experience through a single Open Finance API. Understand their behavior, move money and develop unique products.
[Test now](https://pluggy.ai/<https:/dashboard.pluggy.ai>)
Do you have any doubt?Leave your emailOrTalk to us!
Conecte a sua conta
![Nubank logo](https://cdn.pluggy.ai/assets/connector-icons/212.svg)
Nubank
CPF000.000.000-00
Senha***********
![Nubank logo](https://cdn.pluggy.ai/assets/connector-icons/212.svg)
Nubank
Autenticação concluída!
Detalhes da conta
Identidade |Bruno Pereira
Meses cobertos pelorelatório: 12
Conta correnteBalance R$ 716,78
Cartão de créditoBalance R$ 30,37
Investimentos de renda fixaBalance R$ R$ 229,44
## Trust in Pluggy
![Sicredi logo](https://pluggy.ai/logos/sicredi-logo.svg)
![Unicred logo](https://pluggy.ai/logos/unicred-logo.svg)
![Kinvo logo](https://pluggy.ai/logos/kinvo-logo.svg)
![Nibo logo](https://pluggy.ai/logos/nibo-logo.svg)
![Minhas Economias logo](https://pluggy.ai/logos/minhas-economias-logo.svg)
## One single API that brings all the financial datayou need.
[View demo](https://pluggy.ai/</en/demo>)
Do you have any doubt? Talk to us!
## Start instant payments via PIX with Open Finance
Improve your conversion rates with Payment Initiation, a secure form of instant payments available through Pix + Open Finance. Speed up your purchase processes, account opening, and various other operations.
[Make a donation](https://pluggy.ai/</en/donate>)
![Payments App](https://pluggy.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fpayments-section%2Fapp.png&w=1080&q=75)
Implement in a few hours!
## From developers to developers
We’ve thought of everything so that Open Finance is no longer a problem in your development pipeline.
[Take me to the documentation](https://pluggy.ai/<https:/developer.pluggy.ai>)
  * Get transactions
  * Get balance
  * Get investments
  * Get ID

```
{
"id": "5d6b9f9a-06aa-491f-926a-15ba46c6366d","description": "Rappi","currencyCode": "BRL","amount": 41.58,"date": "2020-06-08T00:00:00.000Z","balance": 41.58,"category": "Online Payment","status": "POSTED"
}
```

## meu.pluggy
A simple and powerful Open Finance toolkit for developers.
### Open Finance for Personal Projects
Empower your development with our free, feature-rich Open Finance toolkit for developers.
Easy Integration
Updated Data
Secure & Compliant
Free for Developers
[Get Started for Free](https://pluggy.ai/<https:/my.pluggy.ai>)[View Documentation](https://pluggy.ai/<https:/github.com/pluggyai/meu-pluggy>)
```
import { Pluggy } from 'pluggy-sdk';
const client = new PluggyClient({
  clientId: CLIENT_ID,
  clientSecret: CLIENT_SECRET,
 })
const data = await pluggy.fetchAccounts(meuPluggyItemId);
console.log(data);
// response example
{
 "id": "4f61bd6d-e6fc-44b2-9c4b-5609058de7ab",
 "type": "CREDIT",
 "subtype": "CREDIT_CARD",
 "name": "Nubank Mastercard Ultravioleta",
 "marketingName": "Nubank Ultravioleta",
 "taxNumber": "***.***.123-22",
 "owner": "Marcos Pangriel",
 "number": "1234",
 "balance": 142.41,
 "creditData": {
  ...
 }
}

```

generated_description:
**Pluggy: Your Open Finance Gateway in Brazil**

Founded in 2020 and hailing from São Paulo, Pluggy is Brazil's answer to fintech infrastructure, drawing comparisons to Plaid in the U.S. Its mission? To empower developers by simplifying access to users' financial data, addressing Brazil's unique challenges head-on. 

Pluggy operates within a vast market—over $7 billion—by covering around 90% of bank accounts in Brazil, a notable achievement considering the intricate landscape of Brazilian finance. This local focus isn't just a buzzword; it's embedded in Pluggy's approach, crafted with deep banking experience and a commitment to delivering timely, reliable data.

With a team of 31 talent members, Pluggy is part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, leveraging the accelerator’s world-class resources. The company has distinguished itself with a suite of powerful products for developers, including:

- **Pluggy Connect**: A simple widget for fast data integration.
- **Recurring Payments**: Simplifying billing processes for clients.
- **Open Finance No-Code Solutions**: A plug-and-play option for businesses.
- **Data Enrichment**: Unlocking insights from raw financial data.
- **Pluggy API**: Streamlined connections for account access.
- **Instant Payment Initiation**: Fast-track payments through native applications.

Their infrastructure is designed not just to connect, but to enhance user experience, offering tools like **My Pluggy** for consent management and features for credit portability and secure transactions. 

Pluggy isn’t merely a financial data provider; it’s a strategic partner enabling businesses to transform their operations—from ERP systems to customer financial platforms. They also stand committed to educating the market with resources including a blog, podcasts, and technical documentation, all encapsulated within an intuitive web interface.

With impressive backing and a sharp focus, Pluggy aims to unlock the full potential of Open Finance in Brazil, reinforcing trust and security in financial transactions while giving developers the power they need to innovate.

For more information, visit [Pluggy's website](https://pluggy.ai) to explore their offerings and join the evolution of finance in Brazil.
